the most fun youve had in years Celebrate New Years Eve in style with Pure NRG Productions Bibi Magazine Dress in your most fashionable threads for this glittering evening of internationallythemed fashion music dinner and dance Enjoy the Bibi Fashion Show dance to the hottest DJs taste gourmet cuisine and ring the New Year with your fellow hipsters models friends and famous faces Its a night to see and be seen Get ready Texas New Years Eve has never looked this good THE PROGRAM This ultraglamorous party will be held at the prestigious Westin Galleria hotel located on West Alabama in Houston Texas Guests will arrive at pm for this Black Tie event and will be welcomed to a cocktail social hour The anticipation will be building as guests dine on an international gourmet palate of delectable cuisine designed to suit everyones taste At pm guests will take their seats as the main party officially begins with an electrifying Bibi Fashion Show the likes of which has yet to be seen in Texas thus far The fashion show will include a blend of designs ranging from exotic South Asian wear to chic American to the unexpectedly bizarre Intermixed throughout the upbeat show will be dancers entertainers and performance artists all working to create an ambiance perfect for the New Years arrival After the Bibi Fashion Show has reached its crescendo the catwalk will convert into a club with the hottest DJs in Texas spinning the most danceable international tracks The models will invite the crowd to dance with them to music that will fuse the hottest sounds of American Latin Bhangra and Arabic tunes At midnight as ends and begins all will raise their glasses in a combined countdown and complimentary champagne toast to the New Year Both alcoholic and nonalcoholic champagne will be served The following hours will be filled with more dancing dining and delirious fun as the DJs continue to spin even more party music The buffet will be abundant all night long and a cash bar will ensure that each person is well taken care of Dont forget to dress your stylish best as prizes are distributed for the best dressed the most fashionable the best dancers the most outrageous and more Prizes will be awarded after midnight so plan on being present to win Party favors and special treats will be provided for all to make sure this New Years Eve is unforgettable A portion of the proceeds will benefit the Red Cross in order to help our fellow Americans SPONSORS Pure NRG Productions Bibi Magazine Asia Society Savoy K Jewelers Tovas Hair Salon APAHA Ten Cafe AA Video FEATURING
